rows.title: Office Space
rows.tagline: Work sucks
rows.cast: Ron Livingston, Jennifer Aniston
rows.summary: Peter hates his job at a large, soulless corporation--until a hypnotherapist dies moments after putting Peter in a state of complete detachment. When Peter begins to rebel, he becomes a rising corporate star.

rows.title: The Big Lebowski
rows.tagline: The 'Dude' abides
rows.cast:
Jeff Bridges,
John Goodman, Steve Buscemi
rows.summary: 'Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

rows.title: Fight Club
rows.tagline: How much can you know about yourself?
rows.cast:
Ed Norton,
Brad Pitt
rows.summary: An office employee and a soap salesman build a global organization to help vent male aggression.

rows.title: Reign of Fire
rows.tagline: Fight fire with fire
rows.cast: Matthew McConaughey, Christian Bale
rows.summary: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting fire to everything, establishing dominance over the planet.

rows.title: One Hour Photo
rows.tagline: There's nothing more dangerous than a familiar face.
rows.cast: Robin Williams
rows.summary: An employee of a one-hour photo lab becomes obsessed with a young suburban family.

rows.title: Reds
rows.cast: Warren Beatty, Diane Keaton
rows.summary: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Communist revolution in Russia and hopes to bring its spirit and idealism to the United States.

rows.title: Doctor Zhivago
rows.tagline: A love caught in the fire of revolution
rows.cast: Omar Sharif, Julie Christie
rows.summary: A Russian doctor/poet, although married, falls for a political activist's wife and struggles through the Bolshevik Revolution.

rows.title: The Usual Suspects
rows.tagline: The truth is always in the last place you look.
rows.cast: Kevin Spacey, Gabriel Byrne
rows.summary: A shipful of heroin is destroyed, dozens are dead, and the only survivor tells a twisted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.

rows.title: Three Kings
rows.tagline: They're deserters and thieves, but in the nicest way.
rows.cast: George Clooney, Mark Wahlberg, Ice Cube
rows.summary: In the chaotic aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four U.S. soldiers set out to steal millions in gold originally stolen from Kuwait.

rows.title: Hancock
rows.tagline: He's saving the world, whether we like it or not.
rows.cast:
Will Smith,
Charlize Theron, Jason Bateman
rows.summary: A crude, hard-drinking superhero, despised by the public, discovers a past relationship with the wife of the public relations man who's trying to repair his image.

rows.title: Bruce Almighty
rows.tagline: The guy next door just became the Guy upstairs.
rows.cast: Jim Carrey, Morgan Freeman
rows.summary: A guy who complains about God too often is given almighty powers to teach him how difficult it is to run the world.

rows.title: Point of No Return
rows.tagline: The government gave her a choice. Death, or life as an assassin.
rows.cast: Bridget Fonda, Gabriel Byrne, Dermot Mulroney
rows.summary: A cop-street tough is sentenced to die by lethal injection for killing a cop, but she wakes up after her execution to learn she will instead be trained as a secret government assassin.

rows.title: Mystery Men
rows.tagline: We're not your classic heroes, we're the other guys.
rows.cast: Ben Stiller, Janeane Garofalo, Hank Azaria, William H. Macy
rows.summary: A group of inept amateur superheroes must try to save the day when a supervillain threatens to destroy their city.

rows.title: Bee Season
rows.tagline: Words may define us, but it's love that connects us.
rows.cast: Richard Gere, Juliette Binoche
rows.summary: A theology professor avoids dealing with his collapsing marriage by immersing himself in his 11 year-old daughter's quest to become a spelling bee champion.

rows.title: Match Point
rows.tagline: There are no little secrets.
rows.cast: Scarlett Johansson, Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Emily Mortimer
rows.summary: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for a femme-fatal type who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.

rows.title: The Mothman Prophesies
rows.tagline: Based on true events.
rows.cast: Richard Gere, Laura Linney
rows.summary: A reporter is drawn to a small West Virginia town to investigate a series of strange events, including psychic visions and the appearance of bizarre entities.

rows.title: My Left Foot
rows.tagline: A film about life, laughter, and the occasional miracle.
rows.cast: Daniel Day-Lewis
rows.summary: The story of Christy Brown, who was born with cerebral palsy. He learned to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

rows.title: Scotland, PA
rows.tagline: Greasy spoon. Bloody murder.
rows.cast: James LeGros, Maura Tierney, Christopher Walken
rows.summary: Hard-working doofus Joe McBeth and his ambitious wife Pat scheme and murder to take over a burger joint.

rows.title: Chaos Theory
rows.tagline: He planned his life like clockwork... until things started going cuckoo.
rows.cast: Ryan Reynolds, Emily Mortimer, Stuart Townsend
rows.summary: Frank, a compulsive list-maker and paragon of punctuality, gets behind schedule one day by a mere ten minutes and watches his world fall down around him.

rows.title: Enemy of the State
rows.tagline: It's not paranoia if they're really after you.
rows.cast: Will Smith, Gene Hackman
rows.summary: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious, politically motivated crime.

rows.title: Friday Night Lights
rows.tagline: In the small town of Dillon, Texas, one night matters: Friday night.
rows.cast: Billy Bob Thornton
rows.summary: The economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas pins all of its hopes on its heroic high school football team, the Permian High Panthers.

rows.title: Garden State
rows.tagline: Family: a group of people who miss the same imaginary place.
rows.cast: Zach Braff, Natalie Portman
rows.summary: A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.

rows.title: Juno
rows.tagline: A comedy about growing up...and the bumps along the way.
rows.cast: Ellen Page, Jason Bateman, Michael Cera
rows.summary: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.

rows.title: Minority Report
rows.tagline: Everybody runs.
rows.cast: Tom Cruise, Colin Farrell, Samantha Morton
rows.summary: In the future, criminals are caught before they commit their crimes, but one of the officers in the special unit is accused and sets out to prove his innocence.

rows.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
rows.tagline: It's a sin to kill a mockibird.
rows.cast: Gregory Peck
rows.summary: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.

rows.title: The Queen
rows.tagline: The queen of a nation vs. the princess of hearts
rows.cast: Helen Mirren, Michael Sheen, James Cromwell
rows.summary: After the death of Princess Diana, HM Queen Elizabeth II struggles with her reaction to a sequence of events nobody could have predicted.

rows.title: The Devil Wears Prada
rows.tagline: A million girls would kill to have her job. She's not one of them.
rows.cast: Anne Hathaway, Meryl Streep, Stanley Tucci
rows.summary: A naive young woman comes to New York and scores a job as the assistant to one of the city's biggest magazine editors, the ruthless and cynical Miranda Priestly.

rows.title: Traitor
rows.tagline: The truth is complicated.
rows.cast: Don Cheadle
rows.summary: When a straight arrow FBI agent heads up the investigation into a dangerous international conspiracy, all clues seem to lead to former U.S. Special Operations officer.

rows.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
rows.tagline: Our memories makes us who we are.
rows.cast: Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet, Tom Wilkinson
rows.summary: An ex-couple undergo a procedure to erase each other from their memories, but it is only through the process of loss that they discover what they had to begin with.

rows.title: Marathon Man
rows.tagline: 'Is it safe?'
rows.cast: Dustin Hoffman, Laurence Olivier, Roy Scheider
rows.summary: A graduate history student is caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.

rows.title: Boys From Brazil
rows.tagline: If they survive, will we?
rows.cast: Gregory Peck, Laurence Olivier, James Mason
rows.summary: A Nazi hunter in Paraguay discovers a sinister and bizarre plot to rekindle the Third Reich.

rows.title: Sense and Sensibility
rows.tagline: Lose your heart and come to your senses.
rows.cast: Emma Thompson, Kate Winslet
rows.summary: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her daughters poor by the rules of inheritance.

rows.title: The Van
rows.tagline: If they were any closer friends, they'd probably kill each other.
rows.cast: Colm Meaney
rows.summary: Fired from his job at the bakery, Bimbo and his best mate go into business for themselves and purchase a fish and chips van.

rows.title: Doubt
rows.tagline: There is no evidence. There are no witnesses. But for one, there is no doubt.
rows.cast: Meryl Streep, Philip Seymour Hoffman
rows.summary: A nun confronts a priest after suspecting him of sexually abusing a black student. He denies the charges. Quick-fire dialogue tackles themes of religion, morality, and authority.

rows.title: The Governess
rows.tagline: We can be anyone we want.
rows.cast: Minnie Driver, Tom Wilkinson
rows.summary: When privileged Rosina da Silva's father dies, she passes herself off as a gentile and finds employment with a family in faraway Scotland.

rows.title: The Snapper
rows.tagline: She's not telling.
rows.cast: Colm Meaney, Tina Kellegher
rows.summary: Sharon, 20, lives with her parents and many brothers and sisters. When she gets pregnant and refuses to name the father, she becomes the talk of the town. Set in Ireland.

rows.title: Speed
rows.tagline: Get ready for rush hour.
rows.cast: Keanu Reeves, Dennis Hopper, Sandra Bullock
rows.summary: A young cop must save the passengers of a bus that has a bomb set to explode if the bus slows below 50 MPH.

rows.title: A History of Violence
rows.tagline: Tom Stall had the perfect life...until he became a hero.
rows.cast: Viggo Mortensen, Maria Bello, Ed Harris
rows.summary: A mild-mannered man becomes a local hero through an act of violence, which sets off repercussions that will shake his family to its very core.

rows.title: Pay It Forward
rows.tagline: Three imperfect people. One perfect idea.
rows.cast: Kevin Spacey, Haley Joel Osment, Helen Hunt
rows.summary: Trevor McKinney believes in the goodness of human nature. Like many other kids, he's determined to change the world for the better. Unlike most other kids, he succeeds.

rows.title: The Wrestler
rows.tagline: Love. Pain. Glory.
rows.cast: Mickey Rourke, Marisa Tomei, Evan Rachel Wood
rows.summary: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

rows.title: No Country For Old Men
rows.tagline: There are no clean getaways
rows.cast: Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem
rows.summary: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon some dead bodies, a stash of heroin and more than $2 million in cash near the Rio Grande.

rows.title: What Women Want
rows.tagline: Finally, a man is listening.
rows.cast: Mel Gibson, Helen Hunt, Marisa Tomei
rows.summary: After an accident, a chauvenistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.

rows.title: Wag the Dog
rows.tagline: A comedy about truth, justice, and other special effects.
rows.cast: Dustin Hoffman, Robert De Niro, Anne Heche
rows.summary: Before elections, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to distract from a presidential sex scandal.

rows.title: Any Given Sunday
rows.tagline: Play or be played.
rows.cast: Al Pacino, Dennis Quaid, Cameron Diaz
rows.summary: Aging NFL coach Tony D'Amato is forced to reevaluate his time-tested values and strategies, and confront the fact that the game may be passing him by.

rows.title: Falling Down
rows.tagline: An ordinary man at war with the everyday world.
rows.cast: Michael Douglas, Robert Duvall, Barbara Hershey
rows.summary: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

rows.title: Milk
rows.tagline: Never blend in.
rows.cast:
Sean Penn,
Josh Brolin,
Emile Hirsch
rows.summary: The story of Harvey Milk, and his struggles as an American gay activist who fought for gay rights and became California's first openly gay elected official.

rows.title: My Cousin Vinny
rows.cast: Joe Pesci, Marisa Tomei, Ralph Macchio
rows.summary: Bill and Stan are mistaken for murderers while on vacation, and Bill's family sends his cousin to defend them in his first case as a lawyer.

rows.title: The Changeling
rows.tagline: To find her son, she did what no one else dared.
rows.cast: Angelina Jolie
rows.summary: A grief-stricken mother takes on the LAPD when it stubbornly tries to pass off an impostor as her missing child.

rows.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
rows.tagline: For 31 years, it's been two tuxedos and two pianos...but times change.
rows.cast: Jeff Bridges, Michelle Pfeiffer, Beau Bridges
rows.summary: Two brothers hire a female singer for their piano lounge act, but she makes them re-evaluate where they're going, and how honest they have been with each other.

rows.title: Flash of Genius
rows.tagline: They had the power. He had the truth.
rows.cast: Greg Kinnear
rows.summary: Robert Kearns takes on the Detroit automakers who he claims stole his idea for the intermittent windshield wiper.

rows.title: Frost/Nixon
rows.tagline: 400 million people were waiting for the truth.
rows.cast: Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Kevin Bacon
rows.summary: A dramatic retelling of the post-Watergate television interviews between British talk-show host David Frost and former president Richard Nixon.

rows.title: Ghost Town
rows.tagline: He sees dead people, and they're really quite annoying.
rows.cast: Ricky Gervais, Greg Kinnear, Tea Leoni
rows.summary: When an obnoxious dentist dies unexpectedly, but is revived after seven minutes, he wakes up to discover that he now has the annoying ability to see ghosts.

rows.title: Thirteen Days
rows.tagline: You'll never believe how close we came
rows.cast: Kevin Costner
rows.summary: The Kennedy brothers try to prevent a nuclear holocaust during the two-week Cuban missile crisis in October 1962.

rows.title: The Count of Monte Cristo
rows.tagline: Prepare for adventure. Count on revenge.
rows.cast: James Caviezel, Guy Pearce, Richard Harris
rows.summary: A young man, betrayed and falsely imprisoned, escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge.

rows.title: Sunshine
rows.tagline: If it dies, so do we.
rows.cast: Cillian Murphy, Rose Byrne, Chris Evans
rows.summary: Fifty years into the future, a team of astronauts are sent to re-ignite the dying sun.

rows.title: Stigmata
rows.tagline: You don't have to believe to suffer
rows.cast: Patricia Arquette, Gabriel Byrne
rows.summary: A researcher of miracles on behalf of the Vatican must discover the truth behind a hairdresser mysteriously afflicted by stigmata.

rows.title: That Thing You Do
rows.tagline: Strap yourself in, kids.
rows.cast: Tom Hanks, Liv Tyler, Charlize Theron
rows.summary: A Pennsylvania band scores a hit in 1964 and rides the star-making machinery as long as it can, with lots of help from its manager.

rows.title: Get Smart
rows.tagline: Saving The World. And Loving It.
rows.cast: Steve Carell, Anne Hathaway, Alan Arkin
rows.summary: Maxwell Smart, Agent 86, battles the forces of KAOS with the more-competent Agent 99 at his side.

rows.title: Stranger Than Fiction
rows.tagline: Harold isn't crazy. He's just written that way.
rows.cast: Will Ferrell, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Emma Thompson, Dustin Hoffman
rows.summary: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of an authorial narration only he can hear.

rows.title: Tin Men
rows.tagline: The American Dream changes. The people who sell it don't.
rows.cast: Richard Dreyfuss, Danny DeVito, Barbara Hershey
rows.summary: A minor car accident drives two rival aluminum-siding salesmen to the ridiculous extremes of man versus man in 1963 Baltimore.

rows.title: I Am Legend
rows.tagline: The last man on earth is not alone.
rows.cast: Will Smith
rows.summary: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

rows.title: The Name of the Rose
rows.tagline: They believed in God, but traded with the Devil.
rows.cast: Sean Connery, Christian Slater
rows.summary: An intellectually nonconformist monk investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

rows.title: The Ice Storm
rows.tagline: It was 1973, and the climate was changing.
rows.cast: Kevin Kline, Joan Allen, Sigourney Weaver
rows.summary: In 1973 suburban Connecticut, two middle class families experimenting with casual sex find their lives out of control.

rows.title: Remains of the Day
rows.tagline: When he's in the room it's even more empty.
rows.cast: Anthony Hopkins, Emma Thompson
rows.summary: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years before WWII realizes too late how misguided his loyalty has been.

rows.title: Vanilla Sky
rows.tagline: Open your eyes.
rows.cast: Tom Cruise, Penelope Cruz, Cameron Diaz
rows.summary: A successful publisher finds his life taking a turn for the surreal after a car accident with a jaded lover.

rows.title: Bounce
rows.tagline: Two strangers fell in love. One knew it wasn't by chance.
rows.cast: Ben Affleck, Gwyneth Paltrow
rows.summary: A man switches plane tickets with another, who then dies when the plane crashes. In an attempt to redeem himself, he tries to help the dead man's beautiful widow.

rows.title: Defending Your Life
rows.tagline: Here's what really happens after you die.
rows.cast: Albert Brooks, Meryl Streep, Rip Torn
rows.summary: Yuppie Daniel Miller is killed in a car accident and goes to Judgment City, an afterlife in which he must  prove that he has overcome his many fears.

rows.title: October Sky
rows.tagline: Based on a true story
rows.cast: Jake Gyllenhaal, Chris Cooper, Laura Dern
rows.summary: A coal miner's is inspired by the first Sputnik launch to take up rocketry against his father's wishes.

rows.title: Being John Malkovich
rows.tagline: Be all that someone else can be.
rows.cast: John Cusack, Cameron Diaz, Catherine Keener
rows.summary: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of the movie star John Malkovich.

rows.title: Children of Men
rows.tagline: The future's a thing of the past.
rows.cast: Julianne Moore, Clive Owen
rows.summary: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which humans can no longer procreate, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary.

rows.title: Dan in Real Life
rows.tagline: Life is so simple on paper.
rows.cast: Steve Carell, Juliette Binoche, Dane Cook
rows.summary: A widower and advice columnist finds out the woman he has fallen in love with is his brother's new girlfriend.

rows.title: Jersey Girl
rows.tagline: Forget who you were, accept who you are.
rows.cast: Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, George Carlin
rows.summary: After his career is sidelined from an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, a single man must abandon his career and take care of his daughter.

rows.title: Reservoir Dogs
rows.tagline: It's a perfect crime. Now all they have to fear is each other.
rows.cast: Harvey Keitel, Tim Roth, Michael Madsen
rows.summary: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.

rows.title: The Full Monty
rows.tagline: Six men with nothing left to lose but their pants.
rows.cast: Robert Carlyle, Tom Wilkinson
rows.summary: Six unemployed steel workers seek a livelihood and self-respect by forming a male striptease act.

rows.title: Without a Clue
rows.tagline: Meet the world's greatest detective... and Sherlock Holmes.
rows.cast: Michael Caine, Ben Kingsley, Jeffrey Jones
rows.summary: A drunken actor posing as Sherlock Holmes is just a cover for the real detective - Dr .Watson.

rows.title: Little Miss Sunshine
rows.tagline: Everyone just pretend to be normal.
rows.cast: Steve Carell, Toni Collette, Greg Kinnear
rows.summary: A family determined to get their young daughter into the finals of a beauty pageant take a cross-country trip in their VW bus.

rows.title: The Contender
rows.tagline: Sometimes you can assassinate a leader without firing a shot.
rows.cast: Joan Allen, Gary Oldman, Jeff Bridges
rows.summary: Laine Hanson is nominated to become the first female vice president, but information and disinformation about her past surface and threaten to de-rail her confirmation.

rows.title: Shirley Valentine
rows.tagline: No one thought she had the courage. Or the lingerie.
rows.cast: Pauline Collins, Tom Conti
rows.summary: A middle-aged Liverpool housewife feels her life has been wasted, until a rebellious trip to sunny Greece helps her see herself in a new light.

rows.title: Crimson Tide
rows.tagline: Danger runs deep.
rows.cast: Gene Hackman, Denzel Washington
rows.summary: On a U.S. nuclear missile sub, a young first officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger-happy captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.

rows.title: Flightplan
rows.tagline: Could you prove that you're sane?
rows.cast: Jodie Foster
rows.summary: A bereaved woman and her daughter are flying home from Europe. At 30,000 feet the child vanishes and nobody admits she was ever on the plane.

rows.title: The Shawshank Redemption
rows.tagline: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
rows.cast: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman
rows.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

rows.title: Thank You For Smoking
rows.tagline: Don't hide the truth. Just filter it.
rows.cast: Aaron Eckhart, Maria Bello
rows.summary: Big Tobacco's chief spokesman spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his twelve-year-old son.

rows.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall
rows.tagline: A comedy about getting dumped, and taking it like a man.
rows.cast: Kristen Bell, Jason Segel, Paul Rudd
rows.summary: Heartbroken Peter takes a Hawaiian vacation to deal with recent break-up, but his ex shows up at the same resort with her new boyfriend.

rows.title: The Forgotten
rows.tagline: Surrender your memories and you surrender yourself
rows.cast: Julianne Moore, Dominic West
rows.summary: Told that their children never existed, a man and woman soon discover that there's a much bigger enemy at work.

rows.title: Get Shorty
rows.tagline: The Mob is tough. But it's nothing like show business.
rows.cast: John Travolta, Gene Hackman, Rene Russo, Danny DeVito
rows.summary: A mobster travels to Hollywood to collect a debt and discovers that the movie business is much the same as his current job.

rows.title: Iron Man
rows.tagline: Heroes aren't born. They're built.
rows.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Gwyneth Paltrow, Jeff Bridges
rows.summary: When wealthy industrialist Tony Stark is forced to build an armored suit after a life-threatening incident, he ultimately decides to use its technology to fight against evil.

rows.title: Lars and the Real Girl
rows.tagline: To find true love, sometimes you have to think inside the box.
rows.cast: Ryan Gosling, Emily Mortimer, Paul Schneider
rows.summary: A delusional young man strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.

rows.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
rows.tagline: Based on a true story
rows.cast: Will Smith
rows.summary: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional endeavor.

rows.title: The Illusionist
rows.tagline: Nothing is what it seems.
rows.cast: Edward Norton, Paul Giamatti, Rufus Sewell
rows.summary: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

rows.title: Eagle Eye
rows.tagline: Don't walk. Run.
rows.cast: Shia LaBeouf
rows.summary: Two strangers are thrown together by mysterious phone calls. The voice on the phone pushes them into increasingly dangerous situations, using technology to track and control their every move.

rows.title: The Andromeda Strain
rows.tagline: It's a bad day to be human.
rows.cast: Eric McCormack
rows.summary: A crack team of top scientists work feverishly in a secret laboratory to discover what has killed the citizens of a small town.

rows.title: Tropic Thunder
rows.tagline: They think they're just making a movie. They're wrong.
rows.cast: Ben Stiller, Jack Black, Robert Downey Jr.
rows.summary: Through a series of freak occurrences, a group of actors shooting a big-budget war movie are forced to become the soldiers they are portraying.

rows.title: The Accidental Tourist
rows.tagline: It's not just how much you love someone. It's who you are when you're with them.
rows.cast: William Hurt, Kathleen Turner, Geena Davis
rows.summary: An emotionally distant writer of travel guides must carry on with his life after his son is killed and his marriage crumbles.

rows.title: Ghost
rows.tagline: Don't let death get in your way.
rows.cast: Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore, Whoopi Goldberg
rows.summary: After being killed during a botched mugging, a man's love for his girlfriend enables him to remain on earth as a ghost.

rows.title: Adaptation
rows.tagline: Charlie Kaufman writes the way he lives: with great difficulty.
rows.cast: Nicolas Cage, Meryl Streep, Chris Cooper
rows.summary: A lovelorn screenwriter turns to his less talented twin brother for help when his efforts to adapt a non-fiction book go nowhere.

rows.title: 3:10 to Yuma
rows.tagline: Time waits for one man.
rows.cast: Russell Crowe, Christian Bale
rows.summary: A battle of wills ensues when a small-time rancher agrees to escort a captured outlaw to a train that will take him to stand trial for murder.

rows.title: Poltergeist
rows.tagline: It knows what scares you.
rows.cast: JoBeth Williams, Craig T. Nelson
rows.summary: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts, one of whom abducts their young daughter.

rows.title: Sliding Doors
rows.tagline: There are two sides to every story. Helen is about to live both of them.
rows.cast: Gwyneth Paltrow, John Hannah
rows.summary: A London woman's love life and career split into two parallel realities when she does/doesn't catch a train.

rows.title: Species
rows.tagline: Be intrigued. Be seduced. Be warned.
rows.cast: Ben Kingsley, Alfred Molina, Forest Whitaker
rows.summary: A team of scientists race to find and destroy a human-alien hybrid before she can find a mate and breed.

rows.title: Best in Show
rows.cast: Fred Willard, Eugene Levy, Catherine O'Hara, Bob Balaban
rows.summary: Pseudo-documentary follows a colorful array of characters competing at a national dog show.

rows.title: Charlie Wilson's War
rows.tagline: When the world wasn't watching, they changed it forever.
rows.cast: Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts, Philip Seymour Hoffman
rows.summary: A Texas congressman's covert efforts to assist Afghan rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen consequences.

rows.title: Billy Elliot
rows.tagline: Inside every one of us is a hidden talent. The trick is finding it.
rows.cast: Jamie Bell, Julie Walters
rows.summary: A talented young boy becomes torn between his unexpected love of dance and the disintegration of his family.

rows.title: Election
rows.tagline: Reading, Writing, Revenge.
rows.cast: Matthew Broderick, Reese Witherspoon
rows.summary: A high school teacher's personal life unravels as he opposes an insanely ambitious student during school elections.

rows.title: Hollow Man
rows.tagline: If you can't see him, if you can't find him, you can't stop him.
rows.cast: Kevin Bacon, Elisabeth Shue
rows.summary: Scientists discover how to make people invisible, but their test subject becomes an insane killer who stalks them.

rows.title: Dogma
rows.tagline: Prepare Thyself, Dude
rows.cast: Ben Affleck, Matt Damon, Linda Fiorentino
rows.summary: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to re-enter Heaven.

rows.title: Educating Rita
rows.tagline: Sometimes your students are the best teachers.
rows.cast: Michael Caine, Julie Walters
rows.summary: English professor Frank Bryant's world is upturned by Rita, a hairdresser who has decided to find herself by taking an Open University course.

rows.title: Kissing Jessica Stein
rows.tagline: When it comes to love, sometimes she just can't think straight.
rows.cast: Jennifer Westfeldt, Heather Juergensen
rows.summary: Jessica Stein is a single, neurotic journalist and Jewish daughter, questions her sexual identity when she falls into an  affair with another woman.

rows.title: Chasing Amy
rows.tagline: Sex is easy. Love is hard.
rows.cast: Ben Affleck, Joey Lauren Adams, Jason Lee, Casey Affleck
rows.summary: Comic book artists and best pals Holden and Banky have their views on love and friendship tested when Holden falls in love with a bisexual woman.

rows.title: Deep Impact
rows.tagline: Heaven and Earth are about to collide.
rows.cast: Robert Duvall, Téa Leoni, Elijah Wood, Maximillian Schell, James Cromwell
rows.summary: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive.

rows.title: Nicholas Nickleby
rows.tagline: Every family needs a hero.
rows.cast: Charlie Hunnam, Jamie Bell, Christopher Plummer
rows.summary: A young compassionate man struggles to save his family and friends from the abusive exploitation of his coldheartedly grasping uncle.

rows.title: The Milagro Beanfield War
rows.tagline: Nothing has changed in Milagro for 300 years. But there's something about this day...
rows.cast: Rubén Blades, Richard Bradford, Sonia Braga
rows.summary: When a farmer in Milagro  illegally diverts water to irrigate his bean field, the local people support him, leading to class warfare and a clash with the law.

rows.title: 28 Days Later
rows.tagline: Be thankful for everything, because soon there will be nothing.
rows.cast: Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris
rows.summary: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

rows.title: The Ninth Gate
rows.tagline: Leave the unknown alone.
rows.cast: Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin
rows.summary: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two existing copies of a demonic text, gets drawn into an evil conspiracy.

rows.title: Airplane!
rows.tagline: Thank God it's only a movie.
rows.cast: Robert Hays, Julie Hagerty, Leslie Nielsen
rows.summary: An airplane crew takes ill. Surely the only person capable of landing the plane is an ex-pilot afraid to fly. But don't call him Shirley.

rows.title: Changing Lanes
rows.tagline: One wrong turn deserves another
rows.cast: Ben Affleck, Samuel L. Jackson
rows.summary: When a young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident, their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.

rows.title: Galaxy Quest
rows.tagline: The show's been cancelled, but the adventure is just beginning.
rows.cast: Tim Allen, Sigourney Weaver, Alan Rickman
rows.summary: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles for real when an alien race needs their help.

rows.title: Matchstick Men
rows.tagline: Lie, cheat, steal, rinse, repeat.
rows.cast: Nicolas Cage, Alison Lohman, Sam Rockwell
rows.summary: A phobic con artist and his protege are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the con artist's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

rows.title: The Promotion
rows.tagline: Two guys. One job. No rules.
rows.cast: Seann William Scott, John C. Reilly
rows.summary: Two assistant managers of a corporate grocery store vie for a coveted promotion.

rows.title: A Mighty Wind
rows.tagline: Reunited, for better or worse.
rows.cast: Christopher Guest, Eugene Levy, Michael McKean
rows.summary: Mockumentary captures the reunion of 1960s folk trio the Folksmen as they prepare for a show at The Town Hall to memorialize a recently deceased concert promoter.

rows.title: A View From the Top
rows.tagline: Don't stop till you reach the top.
rows.cast: Gwyneth Paltrow, Christina Applegate, Mark Ruffalo, Mike Myers
rows.summary: A trailor-bred woman pursues her goal of becoming an international, first-class flight attendant.

rows.title: The Truman Show
rows.tagline: The world is watching.
rows.cast: Jim Carrey, Ed Harris, Laura Linney
rows.summary: An insurance claims adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a TV show.

rows.title: Zoolander
rows.tagline: 3% body fat. 1% brain activity.
rows.cast: Ben Stiller, Owen Wilson
rows.summary: At the end of his career, a clueless fashion model is brainwashed to kill the Prime Minister of Malaysia.

rows.title: Cannery Row
rows.tagline: You don't have to be crazy to live here, but it helps.
rows.cast: Nick Nolte, Debra Winger
rows.summary: Doc is a lonely marine biologist and ex-baseball star. Suzy is a scrappy drifter too abrasive to succeed as a prostitute. It's a match made on Cannery Row.

rows.title: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
rows.tagline: Welcome to Savannah, Georgia. A city Of hot nights and cold blooded murder.
rows.cast: John Cusack, Kevin Spacey
rows.summary: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

rows.title: Slumdog Millionaire
rows.tagline: What does it take to find a lost love? A) Money B) Luck C) Smarts D) Destiny
rows.cast: Dev Patel, Freida Pinto
rows.summary: Suspected of cheating on the Indian version of 'Who Wants To Be A Millionaire?', a Mumbai slum dweller must explain his unlikely knowledge.

rows.title: The Negotiator
rows.tagline: One of them is holding hostages. The other is demanding surrender. And everyone's holding their breath.
rows.cast: Samuel L. Jackson, Kevin Spacey, David Morse
rows.summary: A police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a govt building to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

rows.title: The Grifters
rows.tagline: Seduction. Betrayal. Murder. Who's conning whom?
rows.cast: Anjelica Huston, John Cusack, Annette Bening
rows.summary: A small-time conman has torn loyalties between his estranged mother and new girlfriend--both of whom are high-stakes grifters with their own angles to play.

rows.title: Fargo
rows.tagline: Small town. Big crime. Dead cold.
rows.cast: William H. Macy, Frances McDormand, Steve Buscemi
rows.summary: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of pregnant Marge Gunderson.

rows.title: Bicentennial Man
rows.tagline: One robot's 200-year journey to become an ordinary man.
rows.cast: Robin Williams, Embeth Davidtz, Sam Neill
rows.summary: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

rows.title: Night at the Museum
rows.tagline: At the Museum of Natural History, something unnatural is occurring.
rows.cast: Ben Stiller, Ricky Gervais, Robin Williams
rows.summary: A newly recruited night security guard at the Museum of Natural History discovers that an ancient curse causes the animals and exhibits on display to come to life and wreak havoc.

rows.title: State and Main
rows.tagline: Big movie. Small town. Huge trouble.
rows.cast: Philip Seymour Hoffman, William H. Macy, Alec Baldwin
rows.summary: A movie crew invades a small town whose residents are all too ready to give up their values for showbiz glitz.

rows.title: Burn After Reading
rows.tagline: Intelligence is only their job.
rows.cast: Brad Pitt, Frances McDormand, George Clooney
rows.summary: A disk containing the memoirs of a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous and dim-witted gym employees who try to sell it.

rows.title: Cider House Rules
rows.tagline: A story about how far we must travel to find the place where we belong.
rows.cast: Tobey Maguire, Charlize Theron, Michael Caine
rows.summary: A compassionate young man, raised in an orphanage and trained to be a doctor there, decides to leave to see the world.

rows.title: The Bounty
rows.tagline: They were friends through hell. They became enemies in Paradise.
rows.cast: Mel Gibson, Anthony Hopkins, Laurence Olivier
rows.summary: After Lt. Bligh's cruelty leads to a mutiny on his ship, Fletcher Christian tries to flee beyond the reach of the British, while Bligh and his loyalists aim for East Timor in a tiny lifeboat.

rows.title: The Opposite of Sex
rows.tagline: You'll laugh, you'll cry, you'll be offended.
rows.cast: Christina Ricci, Martin Donovan and Lisa Kudrow
rows.summary: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

rows.title: Waiting for Guffman
rows.tagline: There's a good reason some talent remains undiscovered
rows.cast: Christopher Guest, Fred Willard, Catherine O'Hara
rows.summary: An aspiring director and the amateur cast of a hokey small-town Missouri musical production go overboard when they learn that someone from Broadway will be in attendance.

rows.title: The Imposters
rows.tagline: Now the time has come...to act.
rows.cast: Oliver Platt, Stanley Tucci, Alfred Molina
rows.summary: Two out-of-work actors accidentally stow away on a ship to hide from a drunken, belligerent lead actor who has sworn to kill them for belittling his talents.

rows.title: Schindler's List
rows.tagline: The List is life.
rows.cast: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley
rows.summary: Oskar Schindler uses Jews to start a factory in Poland during WWII, but after he witnesses the horrors endured by the Jews, he starts to save them.

rows.title: Mississippi Burning
rows.tagline: 1964. When America was at war with itself.
rows.cast: Gene Hackman, Willem Dafoe, Frances McDormand
rows.summary: Two FBI agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

rows.title: City Hall
rows.tagline: Power corrupts.
rows.cast: Al Pacino, John Cusack, Bridget Fonda
rows.summary: The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the deputy mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.

rows.title: A Beautiful Mind
rows.tagline: Paranoia. Schizophrenia. Trigonometry.
rows.cast: Russell Crowe, Ed Harris, Jennifer Connelly
rows.summary: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn to the nightmarish.

rows.title: Boiler Room
rows.tagline: How far would you go? How hard would you fall?
rows.cast: Giovanni Ribisi, Ben Affleck, Tom Everett Scott
rows.summary: A college dropout gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it sounds.

rows.title: Fallen
rows.tagline: Don't trust a soul.
rows.cast: Denzel Washington, John Goodman, Donald Sutherland
rows.summary: Detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they resemble Reese's style.

rows.title: The Score
rows.tagline: There are no partners in crime.
rows.cast: Robert De Niro, Edward Norton, Marlon Brando
rows.summary: An aging thief hopes to retire and live off his ill-gotten wealth when a brash young kid talks him into doing one last heist.

rows.title: The Italian Job
rows.tagline: Get in. Get out. Get even.
rows.cast: Donald Sutherland, Mark Wahlberg, Edward Norton
rows.summary: Thieves plan to steal millions in gold from a crooked colleague by  creating Los Angeles' largest traffic jam ever.

rows.title: Ocean's Eleven
rows.tagline: Are you in or out?
rows.cast: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon, Andy Garcia, Julia Roberts
rows.summary: Danny Ocean rounds up a gang of associates to stage heists of three major Las Vegas casinos simultaneously during a major boxing event.

rows.title: The Sting
rows.tagline: ...all it takes is a little Confidence.
rows.cast: Paul Newman, Robert Redford, Robert Shaw
rows.summary: In 1930s Chicago, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.

rows.title: Waking Ned Devine
rows.tagline: It takes a village to raise the dead.
rows.cast: Ian Bannen, David Kelly, Fionnula Flanagan
rows.summary: When a lottery winner in a small Irish village dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim his identity and the money.

rows.title: Mimic
rows.tagline: Evolution doesn't care who wins.
rows.cast: Mira Sorvino, Jeremy Northam, Alexander Goodwin
rows.summary: Three years ago, entomologist Dr. Susan Tyler designed an insect to kill cockroaches carrying a virulent disease. Now the insects are trying to destroy their only predator: man.

rows.title: The Haunting in Connecticut
rows.tagline: Some things can't be explained.
rows.cast: Virginia Madsen, Martin Donovan, Elias Koteas
rows.summary: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural events in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary.

rows.title: Hitch
rows.tagline: The cure for the common man.
rows.cast: Will Smith, Eva Mendes, Kevin James
rows.summary: While helping his latest client woo the lady of his dreams, a professional 'date doctor' finds his own game doesn't quite work on the columnist with whom he's smitten.

rows.title: Duets
rows.tagline: Six lost souls in search of a little harmony.
rows.cast: Huey Lewis, Gwyneth Paltrow, Paul Giamatti
rows.summary: A professional karaoke hustler reconnects with his daughter and a bored suburban businessman turns outlaw karaoke singer.

rows.title: AI: Artificial Intelligence
rows.tagline: David is 11 years old. His love is real. But he is not.
rows.cast: Haley Joel Osment, Jude Law, Frances O'Connor
rows.summary: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become 'real' so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

rows.title: An American Werewolf in London
rows.tagline: Beware the moon
rows.cast: David Naughton, Jenny Agutter, Griffin Dunne
rows.summary: Two American tourists in England are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

rows.title: Dog Day Afternoon
rows.tagline: In August 1972, Sonny Wortzik robbed a bank.
rows.cast: Al Pacino, John Cazale, Charles Durning
rows.summary: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation, but it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.

rows.title: Dark Matter
rows.tagline: The dark side of the ivory tower.
rows.cast: Meryl Streep, Ye Liu, Peng Chi
rows.summary: A Chinese university student in the United States makes a breakthrough in astrophysics, but his hopes for a Nobel Prize are dashed by academic politics.

rows.title: Shallow Hal
rows.tagline: True love is worth the weight.
rows.cast: Jack Black, Gwyneth Paltrow, Jason Alexander
rows.summary: A superficial man is hypnotized into seeing only women's inner beauty, not their external selves.

rows.title: Punch-Drunk Love
rows.tagline: The course of true love ne'er did run smooth.
rows.cast: Adam Sandler, Emily Watson, Philip Seymour Hoffman
rows.summary: A beleaguered small-business owner finds a harmonium and embarks on a romantic journey with a mysterious woman.

rows.title: The Long Kiss Goodnight
rows.tagline: What's forgotten is not always gone.
rows.cast: Geena Davis, Samuel L. Jackson
rows.summary: A women suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.

rows.title: Revolutionary Road
rows.tagline: How do you break free without breaking apart?
rows.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Christopher Fitzgerald
rows.summary: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

rows.title: Duplicity
rows.tagline: Stealing $40 million is easy. Trusting each other is hard.
rows.cast: Julia Roberts, Clive Owen, Paul Giamatti, Tom Wilkinson
rows.summary: A pair of corporate spies who share a steamy past hook up to pull off a con job on their respective bosses.

rows.title: In the Loop
rows.tagline: Bloodshed, destruction...what's not to like?
rows.cast: Tom Hollander, Peter Capaldi, James Gandolfini
rows.summary: The U.S. president and U.K. prime minister fancy a war. But not everyone agrees that war is a good thing...

rows.title: Joe vs. the Volcano
rows.tagline: A story of love and lava.
rows.cast: Tom Hanks, Meg Ryan, Lloyd Bridges
rows.summary: When a hypochondriac learns that he is dying, he accepts an offer to throw himself in a volcano at a tropical island, and along the way there, learns to truly live.

rows.title: National Treasure
rows.tagline: To break the code, he must break the rules.
rows.cast: Nicolas Cage, Harvey Keitel
rows.summary: A treasure hunter is in hot pursuit of a mythical treasure that has been passed down for centuries, while his enemy races him to the goal.

rows.title: The Game
rows.tagline: You don't play it, it plays you.
rows.cast: Michael Douglas, Deborah Kara Unger, Sean Penn
rows.summary: Wealthy financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.

rows.title: Once
rows.tagline: How often do you find the right person?
rows.cast: Glen Hansard, Markéta Irglová
rows.summary: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse, and record songs that tell their love story.

rows.title: Gigantic
rows.tagline: When it comes to relationships, there are no small surprises.
rows.cast: Paul Dano, Zooey Deschanel, John Goodman
rows.summary: A mattress salesman finds his plan to adopt a Chinese baby augmented by the arrival of a young woman who walks into his workplace and falls asleep on one of the beds.

rows.title: King of California
rows.tagline: You've got to believe in treasure to find it.
rows.cast: Michael Douglas, Evan Rachel Wood
rows.summary: After getting out of a mental institution, a dad tries to convince his daughter that there's Spanish gold buried somewhere under suburbia.

rows.title: Mr. Holland's Opus
rows.tagline: It's not about the direction you take. It's about the direction you give.
rows.cast: Richard Dreyfuss, Glenne Headly
rows.summary: A musician and composer takes a teaching job to pay the rent but life has other plans for him.

rows.title: The Devil's Advocate
rows.tagline: The devil has winning ways.
rows.cast: Keanu Reeves, Al Pacino, Charlize Theron
rows.summary: A hotshot lawyer gets more than he bargained for when he learns his new boss is Lucifer himself.

rows.title: Jerry Maguire
rows.tagline: The rest of his life begins now.
rows.cast: Tom Cruise, Cuba Gooding Jr., Renée Zellweger
rows.summary: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test with the only athlete who stays with him.

rows.title: I Love You, Man
rows.tagline: Are You Man Enough To Say It?
rows.cast: Paul Rudd, Jason Segel, Rashida Jones
rows.summary: Friendless Peter goes on a series of man-dates to find a Best Man for his wedding. But his bond with his new BFF puts a strain on his relationship with his fiancée.

rows.title: District 9
rows.tagline: No humans allowed.
rows.cast: Sharlto Copley, David James
rows.summary: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.

rows.title: The Green Mile
rows.tagline: Paul Edgecomb didn't believe in miracles. Until the day he met one.
rows.cast: Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse
rows.summary: A handful of guards on Death Row must deal with the scheduled execution of a childlike man, convicted of murder & rape, who has the power of miraculous healing.

rows.title: Fracture
rows.tagline: If you look closely enough, everyone has a weak spot.
rows.cast: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling, David Strathairn
rows.summary: An attorney intent on climbing the career ladder toward success, finds an unlikely opponent in a manipulative criminal he's trying to prosecute.

rows.title: Family Business
rows.tagline: There's nothing like a good robbery to bring a family together.
rows.cast: Sean Connery, Dustin Hoffman, Matthew Broderick
rows.summary: Jessie is an aging career criminal. His once delinquent son Vito has turned over a new leaf.  When Vito's son Adam approaches them with a plan for a heist, trouble erupts.

rows.title: Fight Club
rows.tagline: Works great even on tough blood stains.
rows.cast: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Helena Bonham Carter
rows.summary: An office employee and a soap salesman build a global organization to help vent male aggression.

rows.title: Jane Eyre
rows.tagline: Character counts.
rows.cast: Ruth Wilson, Toby Stephens
rows.summary: A young woman becomes governess to the ward of a brooding and enigmatic man. They fall in love, but a secret from his past threatens to destroy their happiness.

rows.title: Knowing
rows.tagline: What happens when the numbers run out?
rows.cast: Nicolas Cage, Chandler Canterbury, Rose Byrne
rows.summary: A time capsule dug up at an elementary school contains some chilling predictions, some of which have already come to pass. A single father comes to believe that his family plays a role in a coming catastrophe.

rows.title: The Commitments
rows.tagline: They had nothing to lose, and they risked it all.
rows.cast: Robert Arkins, Michael Aherne, Angeline Ball
rows.summary: The travails of Jimmy Rabbitte to form the 'World's Hardest Working Band,' The Commitments, and bring soul music to the people of Dublin, Ireland.

rows.title: The Big Lebowski
rows.tagline: Times like these call for a Big Lebowski.
rows.cast: Jeff Bridges, John Goodman, Steve Buscemi, Julianne Moore
rows.summary: 'Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

rows.title: The Arrival
rows.tagline: For centuries we've been watching the skies, when we should have been watching our backs.
rows.cast: Charlie Sheen, Lindsay Crouse, Richard Schiff
rows.summary: Zane, an astronomer, discovers alien life on earth. But the aliens are keeping a deadly secret, and will kill to stop Zane from learning it.

rows.title: Sabrina
rows.tagline: It's a merger no one saw coming.
rows.cast: Harrison Ford, Julia Ormond, Greg Kinnear
rows.summary: An ugly duckling, having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush--a carefree playboy--but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.

rows.title: State of Play
rows.tagline: Find the truth
rows.cast: Russell Crowe, Rachel McAdams, Ben Affleck
rows.summary: A team of investigative reporters work alongside a police detective to try to solve the murder of a congressman's mistress.

rows.title: Sunshine Cleaning
rows.tagline: Life's a messy business.
rows.cast: Amy Adams, Emily Blunt, Alan Arkin
rows.summary: In order to raise the tuition to send her young son to private school, a mom starts an unusual business -- a biohazard removal/crime scene clean-up service -- with her unreliable sister.

rows.title: Seven
rows.tagline: Gluttony, Greed, Sloth, Envy, Wrath, Pride, Lust
rows.cast: Morgan Freeman, Brad Pitt, Kevin Spacey
rows.summary: Police drama about two cops, one new and one about to retire, after a serial killer using the seven deadly sins as his MO.

rows.title: The Abyss
rows.tagline: Deep below the blue surface, there lies a place no one has ever dreamed of.
rows.cast: Ed Harris, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio
rows.summary: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

rows.title: Emma
rows.tagline: Cupid is armed and dangerous.
rows.cast: Gwyneth Paltrow, James Cosmo, Greta Scacchi
rows.summary: In rural 1800s England, things go bad for a young matchmaker after she finds a man for another woman.

rows.title: Dangerous Liaisons
rows.tagline: Lust, seduction, revenge. Just for their amusement.
rows.cast: Glenn Close, John Malkovich, Michelle Pfeiffer
rows.summary: Rich and bored aristocrats in Louis IV's France play high-stakes games of passion and betrayal.

rows.title: The Astronaut's Wife
rows.tagline: Until death do them part.
rows.cast: Charlize Theron, Johnny Depp
rows.summary: After NASA briefly loses contact with two shuttle astronauts, the pair are returned safely to Earth, but it gradually becomes evident that neither of them are quite the same.

rows.title: The Gift
rows.tagline: It was the perfect crime...except someone saw it all.
rows.cast: Cate Blanchett, Katie Holmes, Keanu Reeves
rows.summary: A woman with extrasensory perception is asked to help find a young woman who has disappeared.

rows.title: Cold Mountain
rows.tagline: Find your way home.
rows.cast: Jude Law, Nicole Kidman, Renée Zellweger
rows.summary: In the waning days of the Civil War, a wounded soldier embarks on a perilous journey back home to Cold Mountain, NC to reunite with his sweetheart.

rows.title: Assault on Precinct 13
rows.tagline: Unite and fight.
rows.cast: Ethan Hawke, Laurence Fishburne, Gabriel Byrne
rows.summary: A police sergeant must rally the cops and prisoners together on New Year's Eve to defend a remote precinct under assault by corrupt policemen.

rows.title: Death and the Maiden
rows.tagline: Tonight, mercy will be buried with the past.
rows.cast: Sigourney Weaver, Ben Kingsley, Stuart Wilson
rows.summary: A political activist is convinced that her guest is a man who once tortured her for the government.

rows.title: Good Night, and Good Luck
rows.tagline: We will not walk in fear of one another.
rows.cast: David Strathairn, George Clooney, Patricia Clarkson
rows.summary: Broadcast journalist Edward R. Murrow and CBS dare to take on Sen. Joseph McCarthy.

rows.title: John Adams
rows.tagline: He united the states of America.
rows.cast: Paul Giamatti, Laura Linney
rows.summary: A miniseries on the career of John Adams and the first 50 years of the United States, parts 1-7

rows.title: Fire in the Sky
rows.tagline: Alien abduction. Nov. 5, 1975. White Mountains, northeastern Arizona.
rows.cast: D.B. Sweeney, Robert Patrick and Craig Sheffer
rows.summary: When a group of men clearing bush for the government arrive back in town, claiming their friend was abducted by aliens, their friend's disappearance is treated as murder.

rows.title: An Ideal Husband
rows.tagline: He just doesn't know it yet.
rows.cast: Rupert Everett, Cate Blanchett, Minnie Driver, Julianne Moore
rows.summary: A wealthy government minister with a loving wife stands to lose everything when a woman appears in London with damning evidence of a past misdeed.

rows.title: The Invention of Lying
rows.tagline: In a world of truth-tellers, the liar is king.
rows.cast: Ricky Gervais, Jennifer Garner, Jonah Hill
rows.summary: A comedy set in a world where no one has ever lied, until a writer seizes the opportunity for personal gain.

rows.title: The Rainmaker
rows.tagline: Every underdog has his day.
rows.cast: Matt Damon, Danny DeVito, Claire Danes
rows.summary: An idealistic young lawyer and his cynical partner take on a powerful law firm representing a corrupt insurance company.

rows.title: Runaway Jury
rows.tagline: Trials are too important to be decided by juries.
rows.cast: John Cusack, Rachel Weisz, Gene Hackman
rows.summary: A juror on the inside and a woman on the outside manipulate a court trial involving a major gun manufacturer.

rows.title: Michael Clayton
rows.tagline: The truth is what he makes it.
rows.cast: George Clooney, Tilda Swinton, Tom Wilkinson
rows.summary: An in-house 'fixer' at a corporate law firm finds himself at the center of a conspiratorial maelstrom when one of the firm's senior partners decides to turn on their biggest client.

rows.title: Inglourious Basterds
rows.tagline: Once upon a time in Nazi occupied France...
rows.cast: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth
rows.summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American commandoes are chosen specifically to spread fear throughout the Third Reich by brutally killing Nazis.

rows.title: Funny People
rows.tagline: George Simmons was prepared to die, but then a funny thing happened.
rows.cast: Adam Sandler, Seth Rogen, Leslie Mann
rows.summary: When a seasoned comedian becomes terminally ill, his need for a genuine friend drives him to take a rookie comic under his wing.

rows.title: Julie & Julia
rows.tagline: Passion. Ambition. Butter. Do you have what it takes?
rows.cast: Amy Adams, Meryl Streep, Chris Messina
rows.summary: Julia Child's story of her start in the cooking profession is intertwined with blogger Julie Powell's 2002 challenge to cook all the recipes in Child's first book.

rows.title: Management
rows.tagline: Some moments just feel right.
rows.cast: Jennifer Aniston, Steve Zahn, Woody Harrelson
rows.summary: A traveling art saleswoman tries to shake off a flaky motel manager who falls for her and won't leave her alone.

rows.title: The Great Buck Howard
rows.tagline: Greatness is a state of mind.
rows.cast: Colin Hanks, John Malkovich, Tom Hanks
rows.summary: A young man, much to the chagrin of his father, becomes the new assistant to an illusionist in decline.

rows.title: Quiz Show
rows.tagline: Fifty million people watched, but no one saw a thing.
rows.cast: Ralph Fiennes, John Turturro, Rob Morrow
rows.summary: Dick Goodwin discovers game shows are fixed: pretty boy WASP Charles Van Doren is fed answers so he beats geeky Jew Herbie Stempel.

rows.title: Wimbledon
rows.tagline: She's a golden girl. He's a longshot.
rows.cast: Kirsten Dunst, Paul Bettany, Jon Favreau
rows.summary: A pro tennis player has lost his ambition and plans to quit, until he meets a young player on the women's circuit who relights his fire.

rows.title: (500) Days of Summer
rows.tagline: Boy meets girl. Boy falls in love. Girl doesn't.
rows.cast: Zooey Deschanel, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Geoffrey Arend
rows.summary: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the unfortunate young man who falls for her.

rows.title: Drag Me to Hell
rows.tagline: Even nice people can go to hell.
rows.cast: Alison Lohman, Justin Long
rows.summary: A loan officer who evicts an old woman from her home finds herself the recipient of a supernatural curse. Desperate, she turns to a seer to try and save her soul, while evil forces work to push her to a breaking point.

rows.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
rows.tagline: They have a plan, but not a clue.
rows.cast: George Clooney, John Turturro, Tim Blake Nelson
rows.summary: A take on Homer's 'Odyssey,' set in the Deep South in the 1930's. Three escaped convicts search for treasure while pursued by a relentless lawman.

rows.title: Planet of the Apes
rows.tagline: What does it mean to be human?
rows.cast: Charlton Heston, Roddy McDowall, Kim Hunter
rows.summary: An astronaut crew crash lands on a planet in the distant future where intelligent talking apes are the dominant species, and humans are the oppressed and enslaved.

rows.title: Pontypool
rows.tagline: Words lose their meaning when you repeat them.
rows.cast: Stephen McHattie, Lisa Houle, Georgina Reilly
rows.summary: A language-born pathogen turns residents of a small Ontario town into murderous zombies.

rows.title: The Time Traveler's Wife
rows.tagline: A love story.
rows.cast: Eric Bana, Rachel McAdams, Ron Livingston
rows.summary: A Chicago librarian has a defective gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, and thus a marriage with some unique complications.

rows.title: Whip It
rows.tagline: Be your own hero
rows.cast: Ellen Page, Drew Barrymore, Kristen Wiig
rows.summary: In Bodeen, Texas, an indie-rock loving misfit finds a way of dealing with her small-town misery after she discovers a roller derby league in nearby Austin.

rows.title: World's Greatest Dad
rows.tagline: Lance Clayton is about to get everything he deserves.
rows.cast: Robin Williams, Daryl Sabara, Morgan Murphy
rows.summary: An unsuccessful writer settles for life as a high school teacher, until his obnoxious son's death in a freak accident brings him the greatest opportunity of his life.

rows.title: Pride and Prejudice
rows.tagline: A romance for the ages.
rows.cast: Keira Knightley, Matthew Macfadyen, Brenda Blethyn
rows.summary: The lives of five sisters in Georgian England are turned upside down when a wealthy young man and his arrogant best friend arrive in their neighborhood.

rows.title: Agnes of God
rows.tagline: Something unspeakable happened behind the third floor window.
rows.cast: Jane Fonda, Anne Bancroft, Meg Tilly
rows.summary: When a naive novice nun is discovered with a dead newborn in her convent quarters, a court appointed psychiatrist investigates her case.

rows.title: Sunday in the Park with George
rows.cast: Mandy Patinkin, Bernadette Peters
rows.thumbnail: He made a hat where there never was a hat.
rows.summary: Georges Seurat is torn between his lover, Dot, and his art as he paints his masterpiece, 'A Sunday Afternoon on the Island of Le Grande Jatte.'

rows.title: Behind Enemy Lines
rows.cast: Gene Hackman, Owen Wilson
rows.tagline: In war there are some lines you shouldn't cross.
rows.summary: A Navy navigator is shot down over enemy territory and is ruthlessly pursued by a secret police enforcer. Meanwhile his commanding officer defies orders ito attempt a rescue.

rows.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith
rows.cast: Brad Pitt, Angelina Jolie, Adam Brody
rows.tagline: Who says romance is dead?
rows.summary: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.

rows.title: Raising Arizona
rows.cast: Nicolas Cage, Holly Hunter, John Goodman
rows.tagline: Their lawless years are behind them. Their child-rearing years lay ahead.
rows.summary: When a childless couple (an ex-con & an ex-cop) decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintupelets, their lives get more complicated than they'd anticipated.

rows.title: Solaris
rows.cast: George Clooney, Natascha McElhone
rows.tagline: There are some places Man is not ready to go.
rows.summary: A troubled psychologist is sent to investigate the crew of an isolated research station orbiting a bizarre planet.

rows.title: Hangover
rows.cast: Zach Galifianakis, Bradley Cooper, Justin Bartha
rows.tagline: Some guys just can't handle Vegas.
rows.summary: Three groomsmen lose their about-to-be-wed buddy during their drunken misadventures, then must retrace their steps in order to find him.

rows.title: Gifted Hands: the Ben Carson Story
rows.cast: Ele Bardha, Loren Bass, Geoffrey Beauchamp
rows.tagline: His mother wouldn't take 'No' for an answer.
rows.summary: The true story of a black child raised by a single mother who helps him rise from being a poor student to the top of his class, and then on to become a world-famous neurosurgeon.

rows.title: The Jane Austen Book Club
rows.cast: Kathy Baker, Hugh Dancy, Amy Brenneman
rows.tagline: Six months. Six novels. Six members.
rows.summary: Six Californians start a Jane Austen book club, only to find their relationships begin to resemble 21st century versions of her novels.

rows.title: Happy, Texas
rows.cast: Jeremy Northam, Steve Zahn, William H. Macy
rows.tagline: They need pros. They're getting cons.
rows.summary: Two escaped convicts arrive in the town of Happy, Texas, where they are mistaken for a gay couple hired to direct the town's Little Miss Fresh Squeezed beauty pageant.

rows.title: The Switch
rows.cast: Jennifer Aniston, Jason Bateman, Patrick Wilson
rows.tagline: The most unexpected comedy ever conceived.
rows.summary: An unmarried 40-year-old woman turns to a turkey baster in order to become pregnant. Seven years later, she reunites with her best friend, who has been living with a secret: he replaced her preferred sperm sample with his own.

rows.title: Winter's Bone
rows.cast: Jennifer Lawrence, John Hawkes, Garret Dillahunt
rows.tagline: Never turn your back on family.
rows.summary: An unflinching Ozark Mountain girl hacks through dangerous social terrain as she hunts down her drug-dealing father while trying to keep her family intact.

rows.title: The Special Relationship
rows.cast: Michael Sheen, Demetri Goritsas, Adam Godley
rows.tagline: Even friendship is politics.
rows.summary: A dramatization of former U.K. prime minister Tony Blair's tense relationships with Bill Clinton and George W. Bush.

rows.title: Stone of Destiny
rows.cast: Charlie Cox, Kate Mara, Stephen McCole
rows.tagline: A heist 600 years in the making.
rows.summary: The story of Ian Hamilton, a dedicated nationalist who reignited Scottish national pride in the 1950s with his daring raid on the heart of England to bring the Stone of Scone back to Scotland.

rows.cast: John Cusack, Samuel L. Jackson, Mary McCormack
rows.tagline: No one lasts more than an hour.
rows.summary: A man who specializes in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel.

rows.title: Alice
rows.cast: Caterina Scorsone, Tim Curry, Colm Meaney, Kathy Bates
rows.tagline: Welcome to a whole new Wonderland.
rows.summary: The White Rabbit is a secret organization that works for the Queen of Hearts, abducting people from the real world (referred to as 'Oysters'), so they can be drained of their happiness.

rows.title: Along Came a Spider
rows.cast: Morgan Freeman, Michael Wincott, Monica Potter
rows.tagline: The game is far from over.
rows.summary: A congressman's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school by an insider who calls Det. Alex Cross, sucking him into the case even though he's still recovering from the loss of his partner.

rows.title: Insomnia
rows.cast: Al Pacino, Robin Williams, Hilary Swank
rows.tagline: Don't close your eyes.
rows.summary: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.

rows.title: Paper Moon
rows.cast: Ryan O'Neal, Tatum O'Neal, Madeline Kahn
rows.tagline: There's a sucker born every minute.
rows.summary: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

rows.title: Clue
rows.cast: Eileen Brennan, Tim Curry, Madeline Kahn, Christopher Lloyd
rows.tagline: It's not just a game anymore.
rows.summary: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery.

rows.title: Cold Souls
rows.cast: Paul Giamatti, Emily Watson
rows.tagline: A soul-searching comedy.
rows.summary: An actor feels bogged down by his preparations for a Chekov play, until he finds a way to have his soul extracted and stored.

rows.title: Door to Door
rows.cast: William H. Macy, Kyra Sedgwick, Kathy Baker, Helen Mirren
rows.tagline: He wouldn't take 'no' for an answer.
rows.summary: A man with cerebral palsy is determined to become a salesman.

rows.title: Coco Before Channel
rows.cast: Audrey Tautou, Benoît Poelvoorde, Alessandro Nivola
rows.tagline: Before she was France's famous mademoiselle...
rows.summary: The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world.

rows.title: I Love You to Death
rows.cast: Kevin Kline, Tracey Ullman, William Hurt, Keanau Reeves, River Phoenix
rows.tagline: When somebody shoot you in the head, it make you think.
rows.summary: A black comedy about the hapless wife of a pizzeria owner who decides to kill her cheating husband.

rows.title: My Sister's Keeper
rows.cast: Cameron Diaz, Abigail Breslin, Alec Baldwin
rows.tagline: It's her life, too.
rows.summary: A girl seeks legal emancipation from her parents, who for years have relied on her as a donor to keep her leukemia-stricken sister alive.

rows.title: Precious
rows.cast: Gabourey Sidibe, Mo'Nique, Paula Patton
rows.tagline: Life is hard. Life is painful. Life is....Precious.
rows.summary: In Harlem, an overweight, illiterate teen who is pregnant with her second child is invited to enroll in an alternative school in hopes that her life can head in a new direction.

rows.title: Sherlock Holmes
rows.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Jude Law, Rachel McAdams
rows.tagline: Nothing escapes him
rows.summary: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

rows.title: Shutter Island
rows.cast: Leonardo DiCaprio, Emily Mortimer, Mark Ruffalo
rows.tagline: Someone is missing.
rows.summary: In 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels investigates the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.

rows.title: The Damned United
rows.cast: Colm Meaney, Henry Goodman, David Roper
rows.tagline: They love me for what I'm not...they hate me for what I am.
rows.summary: A look at Brian Clough's 44-day reign as the coach of Leeds United.

rows.title: Orphan
rows.cast: Vera Farmiga, Peter Sarsgaard, Isabelle Fuhrman
rows.tagline: There's something wrong with Esther.
rows.summary: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she seems to be.

rows.title: Up in the Air
rows.cast: George Clooney, Vera Farmiga, Anna Kendrick
rows.tagline: The story of a man ready to make a connection.
rows.summary: With a job that has him traveling around the country firing people, Ryan Bingham leads an empty life out of a suitcase, until his company does the unexpected: grounds him.

rows.title: The Informant
rows.cast: Matt Damon, Tony Hale, Patton Oswalt
rows.tagline: Based on a tattle-tale
rows.summary: The U.S. government decides to go after an agri-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president turned informant Mark Whitacre.

rows.title: The Box
rows.cast: Cameron Diaz, James Marsden, Frank Langella
rows.tagline: All you have to do is push the button.
rows.summary: A small wooden box arrives on the doorstep of a married couple, who know that opening it will grant them a million dollars and kill someone they don't know.

rows.title: Crazy Heart
rows.cast: Jeff Bridges, Maggie Gyllenhaal, Colin Farrell
rows.tagline: The harder the life, the sweeter the song.
rows.summary: A faded country music musician is forced to reassess his dysfunctional life during a doomed romance that also inspires him.

rows.title: Easy Virtue
rows.cast: Jessica Biel, Ben Barnes, Kristin Scott Thomas
rows.tagline: In a family stifled in propriety, vice is a virtue.
rows.summary: A young Englishman marries a glamorous American. When he brings her home to meet the parents, she arrives like a blast from the future - blowing their entrenched British stuffiness out the window.

rows.title: The Young Victoria
rows.cast: Emily Blunt, Rupert Friend, Paul Bettany
rows.tagline: Her country. Her heart. Her majesty.
rows.summary: A dramatization of the turbulent first years of Queen Victoria's rule, and her enduring romance with Prince Albert.

rows.title: Is Anybody There?
rows.cast: Michael Caine, Bill Milner, Anne-Marie Duff
rows.summary: A 10-year-old boy growing up in an old people's home run by his parents develops a fascination with the afterlife.

rows.title: Flawless
rows.cast: Demi Moore, Michael Caine, Lambert Wilson
rows.tagline: He had a scheme. She had a motive.
rows.summary: In 1960 London, a soon to retire janitor convinces a glass ceiling constrained American executive to help him steal a handful of diamonds from their employer.

rows.title: It's Complicated
rows.cast: Meryl Streep, Steve Martin, Alec Baldwin
rows.tagline: Divorced... with benefits.
rows.summary: When attending their son's college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship...but the problem is they're divorced and he's remarried.

rows.title: The Book of Eli
rows.cast: Denzel Washington, Gary Oldman, Mila Kunis
rows.tagline: Deliver us from darkness
rows.summary: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

rows.title: Pirate Radio
rows.cast: Philip Seymour Hoffman, Bill Nighy, Nick Frost
rows.tagline: They rocked. They rolled. Then they sank.
rows.summary: An illegal radio station in the North Sea in the 1960s fights to stay on the air.

rows.title: The Ghost Writer
rows.cast: Ewan McGregor, Pierce Brosnan, Olivia Williams
rows.tagline: Read between the lies.
rows.summary: A ghostwriter hired to complete the memoirs of a former British prime minister uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.

rows.title: The Omen
rows.cast: Liev Schreiber, Julia Stiles, Seamus Davey-Fitzpatrick
rows.tagline: Let him that hath understanding count the number of the beast.
rows.summary: In a remake of the horror classic The Omen (1976), an American official realizes that his young son may be the devil incarnate.

rows.title: Fever Pitch
rows.cast: Colin Firth, Ruth Gemmell, Luke Aikman
rows.tagline: Life gets complicated when you love one woman and worship eleven men.
rows.summary: An English teacher believes his long standing obsession with Arsenal serves him well. But then he meets Sarah.

rows.title: Kiss the Girls
rows.cast: Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Cary Elwes, Jeremy Piven
rows.tagline: A detective is searching for a deadly collector. His only hope is the woman who got away.
rows.summary: Police hunting a serial killer get a break when for the first time a victim manages to escape.

rows.title: The Other Man
rows.cast: Liam Neeson, Antonio Banderas, Laura Linney
rows.tagline: Is knowing the truth worth living a lie?
rows.summary: The story of a husband who suspects his wife of adultery, and sets out to track down the other man in her life.

rows.title: The Straight Story
rows.cast: Richard Farnsworth, Sissy Spacek
rows.summary: An old man makes a long journey by tractor to mend his relationship with an ill brother.

rows.title: The Dish
rows.cast: Sam Neill, Billy Mitchell, Roz Hammond
rows.tagline: Houston's other problem.
rows.summary: A remote Australian antenna, staffed by quirky characters, plays a key role in the first Apollo moon landing.

rows.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin
rows.cast: Steve Carell, Catherine Keener and Paul Rudd
rows.tagline: Better late than never.
rows.summary: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never 'done the deed' only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.

rows.title: Jurrasic Park
rows.cast: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum
rows.tagline: A movie 65 million years in the making.
rows.summary: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaurs to run amok.

rows.title: Unbreakable
rows.cast: Bruce Willis, Samuel L. Jackson, Robin Wright
rows.tagline: Some truths are only revealed by accident.
rows.summary: The sole survivor of a horrific train-crash is approached by a peculiar man with a far fetched theory as to why he hasn't a scratch on him.

rows.title: City Island
rows.cast: Andy Garcia, Julianna Margulies, Steven Strait
rows.tagline: Truth is stranger than family.
rows.summary: A dysfunctional family finds its delicate web of lies disturbed by the arrival of a young ex-con in their midst.

rows.title: Hope Springs
rows.cast: Colin Firth, Minnie Driver, Mary Steenburgen
rows.tagline: She loves me... she loves me not.
rows.summary: A British artist holed up in a rundown hotel after being dumped by his fiancée learns that the hotel manager fancies herself a matchmaker.

rows.title: Children of a Lesser God
rows.cast: William Hurt, Marlee Matlin, Piper Laurie
rows.tagline: Love has a language all of its own.
rows.summary: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls for a pupil who decided to stay on at the school rather than venture into the big bad world.

rows.title: The Joneses
rows.cast: Demi Moore, David Duchovny, Amber Heard
rows.tagline: Some families are too good to be true.
rows.summary: A seemingly perfect family moves into a suburban neighborhood, but when it comes to the truth as to why they're living there, they don't exactly come clean with their neighbors.

rows.title: Cyrus
rows.cast: John C. Reilly, Marisa Tomei, Jonah Hill
rows.tagline: John met the woman of his dreams. Then he met her son ...
rows.summary: A down on his luck divorcé finally meets the woman of his dreams, only to discover she has another man in her life -- her weirdly possessive son.

rows.title: The American
rows.cast: George Clooney, Paolo Bonacelli, Violante Placido
rows.tagline: All men are sinners.
rows.summary: A jaded assassin hiding out in Italy decides to take on one last assignment.

rows.title: The Kids Are All Right
rows.cast: Annette Bening, Julianne Moore, Mark Ruffalo, Mia Wasikowska
rows.tagline: Nic and Jules had the perfect family, until they met the man who made it all possible.
rows.summary: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their birth father into their family life.

rows.title: Walk the Line
rows.cast: Joaquin Phoenix, Reese Witherspoon
rows.tagline: Love is a burning thing.
rows.summary: A chronicle of Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis.

rows.title: The Town
rows.cast: Ben Affleck, Rebecca Hall, Jon Hamm
rows.tagline: Welcome to the bank robbery capital of America.
rows.summary: As he plans his next job, a longtime thief tries to balance his feelings for a bank manager connected to one of his earlier heists, as well as the FBI agent looking to bring him and his crew down.

rows.title: Mo Better Blues
rows.cast: Denzel Washington, Spike Lee, Wesley Snipes
rows.tagline: A Spike Lee joint.
rows.summary: Bleek's and Shadow's onstage rivalry spills into their professional relationship and threatens to tear apart their successful jazz quartet.

rows.title: Little Man Tate
rows.cast: Jodie Foster, Dianne Wiest, Adam Hann-Byrd
rows.tagline: It's not what he knows. It's what he understands.
rows.summary: An exotic dancer raising a genius son on her own is determined to ensure he has all the opportunities he needs.

rows.title: The Social Network
rows.cast: Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake
rows.tagline: You don't get to 500 million friends without making a few enemies.
rows.summary: A chronicle of the infighting behind the founding of Facebook.

rows.title: Dinner for Schmucks
rows.cast: Steve Carell, Paul Rudd, Zach Galifianakis
rows.tagline: Takes one to know one.
